name: NewModemHelper
description: This intent will help customers activate a newly received modem.

plainTextMessage.value: Okay we'll wait on that. If you need further assistance enter 'more options'. Otherwise have a great day, thank you!
Okay perfect. I am ready to activate your new modem. Enter 'yes' and I will process your new modem activation. To cancel enter 'no'.
Your modem is now activated and ready to go. If you need further assistance enter 'more options'. Otherwise, thank you for being a Z-finity customer!
